items.content_html: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: A lightweight Chrome Dinosaur Game clone built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features smooth jump animations and continuously moving obstacles using custom keyframes — ideal for extending with collision detection, scoring.
items.title: Janardhan31/Chrome-Dinasour-Game: A lightweight Chrome Dinosaur Game clone built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features smooth jump animations and continuously moving obstacles using custom keyframes — ideal for extending with collision detection, scoring.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: A robust and scalable backend for a ride-sharing service built with modern JavaScript technologies. This project leverages the Bun runtime for high performance, the HonoJS framework for lightweight and fast API development, and Drizzle ORM for seamless interaction with a PostgreSQL database.
items.title: iamVihanga/Ride-Service-Backend: A robust and scalable backend for a ride-sharing service built with modern JavaScript technologies. This project leverages the Bun runtime for high performance, the HonoJS framework for lightweight and fast API development, and Drizzle ORM for seamless interaction with a PostgreSQL database.

items.content_html: EasyTracker – Smart Time Tracking & Project Management for Freelancers A lightweight and intuitive web app for tracking work sessions, managing clients and projects, setting custom tags, receiving smart reminders (including SMS), and generating detailed reports. Integrates with Google Calendar and invoicing platforms to streamline your workflow.
items.title: ofekhadjadj/EasyTracker: EasyTracker – Smart Time Tracking & Project Management for Freelancers A lightweight and intuitive web app for tracking work sessions, managing clients and projects, setting custom tags, receiving smart reminders (including SMS), and generating detailed reports. Integrates with Google Calendar and invoicing platforms to streamline your workflow.

items.title: simplyrk/form-builder: A modern & lightweight tool for creating and managing forms with support for various field types including text, text areas, date and file uploads.

items.content_html: 🛡️ Sendexa 2FA Server A lightweight, open-source 2FA (Two-Factor Authentication) server built with TypeScript and Node.js. It supports OTP (One-Time Password) generation and verification via SMS and Email, designed for businesses across Africa. This server includes in-memory OTP storage, flexible sender ID configuration, and versioned API endpoint
items.title: sendexa/Sendexa-2fa-Server: 🛡️ Sendexa 2FA Server A lightweight, open-source 2FA (Two-Factor Authentication) server built with TypeScript and Node.js. It supports OTP (One-Time Password) generation and verification via SMS and Email, designed for businesses across Africa. This server includes in-memory OTP storage, flexible sender ID configuration, and versioned API endpoint

items.content_html: Notes App is a lightweight browser-based note-taking tool with color-coding, categorization, and search features. Pin important notes, toggle dark mode, and resize notes as needed. Built with JavaScript and IndexedDB for offline storage, it requires no server to run.RetryClaude can make mistakes. Please double-check responses.
